attributes.action: Be fairer to the Southwest of England
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am fed up with the constant underfunding of the southwest, the highest water bills in the country (they are so high because we have so much coastline that needs to be maintained, only to find that when you want to use the beach, it is full of holidaymakers), high fuel bills and ridiculously high Council Tax bills. We have some of the lowest wages in the country yet are hit the hardest. Life does exist outside London and the Home Counties in case you didn't know!
